properties.Name: Carers Art Group
properties.Description: Carers art group running in Puddletown. Come and join us to be creative, even if you have not picked up a paintbrush since school!

properties.Name: Hadleigh Carers Group
properties.Description: The Hadleigh Practice Carers' Group meet on the first Thursday of every month at the Corfe Mullen Family Church, Wareham Road, Corfe Mullen between 2.00pm and 3.30pm.

properties.Name: Canford Heath Carers Support
properties.Description: Canford Heath has a well-established Carers Support Group. This is run by volunteers from the Friends of the Canford Heath Group Practice. Do you help/care for a relative, friend or neighbour on a regular basis? If so come along to our friendly group for
properties.Address: Canford Heath Library, Mitchell Road, Canford Heath, Poole, Dorset BH17 8UE
properties.Description2: tea, cake and helpful information, and to chat with others in a similar situation.

properties.Name: Bridport Rethink Carers Group
properties.Description: A mental health support group providing an opportunity for carers to meet over a cup of tea. A chance to gain information and talk to others who understand. Speakers are often invited to meetings to talk about issues of interest to carers Activity takes

properties.Name: Christchurch Connect Carers Group
properties.Description: A support group for carers in Christchurch. A chance to meet other carers and discuss common issues.

properties.Name: Blandford Carers Support Cafe
properties.Description: Do you care for a loved one? Go along to the carers peer support group run by The Blandford Group Practice and Carer Support Dorset.The Support Cafe meets on the 1st Thursday of each month from 10.30am - 12.30pm in the Parish Rooms where you can have
properties.Address: Whitecliff Mill Street, Blandford, Dorset DT11 7BH
properties.Description2: a cuppa, meet and chat to others.

properties.Name: Lyme Regis Carers Support Group
properties.Description: Hosted and run by Claire Stapley, social worker, for unpaid carers (without the cared-for)  across all three Practice areas.  Drop-in service for free coffee and tea with opportunities for mutual support and asking  questions with professional advice.
properties.Address: Lyme Regis Medical Centre, Uplyme Road, Lyme Regis, Dorset DT7 3LS

properties.Name: Portland Carers Support Group
properties.Description: Portland Carer Support Group offers support to carers of all ages, mostly the over 50s' We have just had our first face to face meeting since lockdown which was a great success. We meet on the last Monday of the month  in the Weston room at Portland
properties.Address: Easton Methodist Church, Easton Square, Easton, Portland, Dorset DT5 1BX
properties.Description2: Methodist Church from 10.30 am We are supported by professionals from social care and our local Gp practice.  Our next meeting all being well will be Monday 31st January 2022 (no meetings on bank holidays)

properties.Name: Weymouth Carers Group
properties.Description: We are a well-established group that supports carers of people with lived experience of mental illness.Come and join us each week to share information and support in a friendly, informal setting and over a cup of tea or coffee and treats. We offer a
properties.Address: Weymouth Carers Support Group, The Leon Centre, 13 Fernhill Avenue, Weymouth DT4 7QU
properties.Description2: friendly, safe and confidential place for a chat and can signpost you to other services.

properties.Name: Wimborne Carers Group
properties.Description: A support group for carers in the Wimborne area. Come along for information and support and a chance to meet new friends. EVERY 3RD FRIDAY - 10:30am - 12:00pm
properties.Address: St John's Church Hall, Leigh Road, Wimborne, Dorset BH21 1AE

properties.Name: My Time (Shaftesbury and Gillingham) - carers support session
properties.Description: A support group for carers in the Shaftesbury and Gillingham area.We have staff available to look after the person you care for to give you the option to come together but to have some time for yourself. Please contact the Centre so that they can make
properties.Address: Shaftesbury Plus Day Centre, Trinity Centre, Bimport, Shaftesbury, Dorset SP7 8BW
properties.Description2: appropriate arrangements before you arrive. These sessions vary depending on what's been arranged each month - sometimes we have an invited speaker, sometimes it's just a coffee and a chat between ourselves. Tuesdays, third week of the month, 2pm to 4pm

properties.Name: Green Island Respite
properties.Description: Taking a break from your caring responsibilities is vital. Caring can be emotionally and physically demanding, so it's important not to overlook your own needs.
